mireka.transmission.immediate

Class RemoteMta

  • Object
    • mireka.transmission.immediate.RemoteMta

  • public class RemoteMta
extends Object
    Collects identification information about a remote MTA as they become available, these informations are eventually used in delivery status notifications

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String address
      resolved address of dnsName or null if dnsName is not yet resolved.
      String dnsName
      Either a name in a DNS MX record or a literal address in square bracket.
